dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4867 IH: Veterans Members Business Loan Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Vicente Gonzalez of Texas (for himself and Mr. Fitzpatrick) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to exclude extensions of credit made to veterans from the definition of a member business loan.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Members Business Loan Act.

subsection.text: Section 107A(c) of the Federal Credit Union Act (12 U.S.C. 1757a(c)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in clause (iv), by striking or at the end;
in clause (v), by striking the period and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (3), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
the term veteran has the meaning given such term under section 101 of title 38, United States Code.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall take effect after the end of the 6-month period beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act.
